PAYMENT.PAYMENT_ACCEPTED_DESC:
You have just credit your account.
Your SMS credit will appear on Quorum in a few hours.
You will receive an email once your account is funded. Good mobilization!
PAYMENT.PAYMENT_ACCEPT_CGS: By checking this box, I agree to Quorum's General Conditions of Services .
PAYMENT.PAYMENT_IBAN_MENTIONS: By providing your IBAN and confirming this payment, you authorize Rocketship Inc. and Stripe, our payment service provider, to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and to your bank to debit your account in accordance with these instructions. You are entitled to a refund from your bank according to the terms and conditions of your contract with your bank. A refund must be requested within 8 weeks from the date your account was debited.
PAYMENT.PAYMENT_TRANSACTION_ERROR:
An error has occurred with your bank details.
Please check the information provided.

SMS.SEND_SMS_FROM_QUORUM_DESC: Give more impact to your cause with Quorum SMS.

SETUP_VAT_NOT_COMPLETE.DESC: To activate the purchase of an SMS pack on your campaign, contact our support.
